description:
Whether it is a Snow Day filled with snow fort construction, or a day at the local resort, this jacket will keep little rippers warm and dry. A tough 2-layer recycled polyester shell stands up to abrasion from crusty snow or branches, and the DWR treatment keeps the droplets beading and prevents saturation. Inside, a soft taffeta lining manages moisture and glides smoothly over underlayers.

  • Durable 2-layer recycled polyester H2No® breathable membrane with a PFC-free DWR finish to keep you dry
  • Insulated with Thermogreen® recycled polyester, tailored thicknesses promote easy movement
  • Recycled polyester lining with HeiQ® Eco Dry PFC-free DWR finish
  • Removable insulated hood is there when they need it and gone when they don’t
  • Plenty of zippered pockets for small must-haves and lift tickets
  • Internal microfleece cuffs with thumb loops keep the cold from creeping in
  • Powder skirt with gripper elastic and loops to connect with compatible ski or snowboard pants
  • Locker loop and name label make cocoa breaks a little easier
  • Grow-fit lets you unstitch extra liner and insulation to gain extra length in the sleeves
name: Patagonia Powder Town Jacket - Youths
